channel.title: [PI]Some serious help needed
channel.description:
Hello, I need some help making a custom minigame.
In this minigame I want that my players kill "dragons" and so archieve them a cape. (...)
But I wanna know how I make them spawn after the other died and put a timer on it. (Actually the principe of a timer in public void process).
It's like fight pits but I don't understand shit about it.
So basically could someone help me with it or explain a little to me?
Help is much appricated :)
And do NOT show me a minigame that already has this. I wanna do this minigame cuz I wanna learn about it. Not leech.

item.title: [PI]Some serious help needed
item.dc:creator: @halflive9 halflive9
item.description:
@halflive9 wrote:

Somewhat like zombie minigames but than with dragons?
You have your fight pits class located src>server>model>minigames
You can base your whole minigame of that.
Just copy the class and add the dragons id’s in final int waves.
Rename to whatever your minigame should be called.
I think you have an idea somewhat now. If it’s still not clear you can always pm me.

Read full topic

Hello,
I need some help making a custom minigame.

In this minigame I want that my players kill “dragons” and so archieve them a cape. (…)

But I wanna know how I make them spawn after the other died and put a timer on it. (Actually the principe of a timer in public void process).

It’s like fight pits but I don’t understand shit about it.

So basically could someone help me with it or explain a little to me?

Help is much appricated

And do NOT show me a minigame that already has this. I wanna do this minigame cuz I wanna learn about it. Not leech.
[/quote]

Did you make this idea…? Or…?[/quote]

It just came up in my head. I’m kind of sure people already have this in some rsps. But I just want more custon minigames like this. SO actually I wanna know the basics behind it;

Read full topic
